Special Abilities / Logic Hooks: Ferocity: If Mauler wins a combat round and inflicts health damage on your hero,the beast automatically raises its speed to 7 for the next round.
Punishing blows: Each time Humbaroth inflicts health damage, your armour is lowered by 1. (The armour value is restored after the combat is over)
Charged: Each time you inflict health damage on the elemental, you take 2 damage in return. This ability ignores armour.
Fiery aura: You automatically take 3 health damage at the end of the round. This ability ignores armour.

Notes: If the goblins habe been reduced to 10 health or less, turn to 77

Special Abilities / Logic Hooks: Black sigill: At the end of each combat round, your hero suffers 1 damage. This ability ignores armour.;Bewitched: Reroll any 1 or 2 dice results for Zalldell. The results of the rerolled dice must be used.
Piercing claws: The ghouls' attacks ignore armour.

Webbed: The spiders's sticky webbing inhibits your movement. At the start of every combat round, roll a die. If you roll a 1 or 2, your speed is reduced by 1 for the round.;Venom: Once you have taken health damage from the spider, at the end of every combat round you must automatically lose 2 health.
Notes: Ignore the Webbed ability if the web was set to fire with the Torch

Special Abilities / Logic Hooks: Crone's dagger: If the Ruffians roll a 6 for damage, the crone's dagger automatically inflicts 1 extra point of health damage.
